title: Let Today Be A Holiday : 365 Ways to Co-Create with God
description:
You have always been God's beloved child. Are you interested in becoming God's grownup?
Why settle for just having conversations with God? Together, you and God can co-create.Deepen experiences along your spiritual path. Some days, this book brings fresh ideas to enhance skills you already have, like prayer and affirmations. Other days, easy-to-learn techniques activate your hidden gifts for deeper perception. Add a dash of poetry for inspiration. And even though co-creation is a sacred process, sometimes the humor in this book will make you laugh out loud. Don't expect any two days to be alike. What remains constant is the author's respect for you as a conscious co-creator: Your creativity, courage and wisdom, the unique gifts of your soul.Rose Rosetree helps you to find the kind of joy that can make any day a holiday. And this book is a perfect gift for any holidayâ€”whether officially a special occasion or that day you celebrate "just because."
author: Rose  Rosetree
